desc.bottom-block: Find the most qualified agents to help you with your real estate projects. Share reviews and compare recently sold properties in your neighborhood.
desc.mission-block: Make the real estate market more transparent so that home sellers can make the best possible decisions
desc.top-block: We draw on the most relevant market indicators to provide you with accurate valuations.  Receive an estimate based on the average value of the price/m² in real time, the impact of the covid or the energy performance indicator.
title.bottom-block: Compare the best agencies in your area
title.image-block: Get your estimation in three easy steps
title.top-block: Get an instant price estimation of your house
first.testimonial.title: Antonette Minaulot
first.testimonial.desc: Contact with an agency that sold 100 meters from my home. Very satisfied !! Professionals, available and a sale with 5% added value. I advise!
second.testimonial.title: Françoise Delin
second.testimonial.desc: Very useful site, I recommend. Quick estimate that matches my idea of the property I have rented.
third.testimonial.title: Eloïse Haumont
third.testimonial.desc: Excellente référence pour les vendeurs immobiliers. Estimation correcte en quelques clics. Très intéressant de savoir ce qui se vend ou ce qui s’est vendu dans son quartier.
fourth.testimonial.title: Luc Vanderstraeten
fourth.testimonial.desc: Quick and logical expertise, I recommend. I had to deal with professionals to follow me in my steps.
fifth.testimonial.title: Emmanuel Vanwaas
fifth.testimonial.desc: After several negative experiences, I no longer wanted to sell. Belgium Immo helped me in my procedures, the transparency of the information available appealed to me, to be tested!
sixth.testimonial.title: Gino Piccolo
sixth.testimonial.desc: A bit lost on the sale of my apartment, Belgium Immo supported me throughout my sale. I recommend for the quality of the estimate and the services offered by the agencies!
